item.title: First working model tell me what yall think
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Rjazjoeaz, just experiment with diferent things on meta before getting too into swords. I am just starting to get models that i am proud of.

V2 of my sword, just about to post it tbh, but the cylinder in the Prims will do well for a handle. But as to making it sharp, ill make a small pic tut later about making a starter model of a sword and or dagger.

Read full topic

experiment with it

make sure you can see a slim difference, but not so it looks like a whole different color

item.description:

item.source: First working model tell me what yall think

item.title: First working model tell me what yall think
item.dc:creator: @xcvxcv2 xcvxcv2
item.description:
@xcvxcv2 wrote:

if you want it to be black and white, trace around the black and then color it black, if you want it to be different colors trace the black and use different shades of the same color

Read full topic

item.title: First working model tell me what yall think
item.dc:creator: @razjazjoe razjazjoe
item.description:
@razjazjoe wrote:

what do you mean without rendering or meta?? and i dont understand how to make the blade part look more like a blade and the hilt look good[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 24, 2009, 02:56:25 pm[/size][hr]
here is one im working on now you notice how the one on the left is all plane and on the right its all detailed how would i make it look like that and not all plane and boring

item.source: First working model tell me what yall think

item.title: First working model tell me what yall think
item.dc:creator: @xcvxcv2 xcvxcv2
item.description:
@xcvxcv2 wrote:

well first, if its a sword make the blade longer, also maybe use different shades of red to make the light reflect

more detail to it. (like a more detailed design of the sword)

also maybe more colors that “blend” together (in my opinion black white and red dont look good)

also can you post a pic without rendering on meta please?

Read full topic
